title: Page settings
page_override_info: Adjust so that the entire page is displayed
page_viewport_info:
Enable HTML viewport or wide viewport
the page contains the viewport meta tag, the value of the width specified in the tag is used.
popup_info: Allow popup of dialog displayed in Java Script
fastback_info:
Moving at high speed when going back and forward on the page
It consumes a lot of memory
fastback_cache_info:
Change the cache size of fast back
0 = unlimited
The more memory you consume the more
pull_to_refresh_info:
Pull further at the top of the page to update
It can not be used on some pages
rendering_info: Change the display color of web page
minimum_font_info:
Change the minimum font size of web page
*Point If the size is big even 1px, set Layout algorithm setting to "Normal"
text_size_info: You can change the character size based on 100%
layout_algorithm_info: You can change the layout algorithm
night_mode_info: You can change the color temperature and brightness when the layout algorithm is in night mode.
